name: Rootrients
description:
Rootrients is a cute puzzle game in which you'll help plants connect their roots to the nutrients they need to live.

Rootrients es un juego de puzzles en el que administrarás la intrincada red de raíces que forman los diferentes tipos plantas para obtener los nutrientes necesarios para su supervivencia.

How to play

Manage and grow roots to connect plants to their nutrients, so they can happily blossom! With each plant having three growing phases, in each one their nutrient requirements change. Plants do be sensitive and picky!

And be aware: once past their seed phase, the more they'll ask, and if you don't fulfill their needs they will perish.

Gestiona tus raíces para conectar cada planta en su correspondiente fuente de nutrientes hasta que todas florezcan. Cada planta tiene 3 fases: semilla, brote, tallo y flor. Y sus condiciones de crecimiento cambiarán cada vez que crezca.

Pero vigila!  una vez aparezca el primer brote, la planta necesitará más nutrientes y su vida descenderá hasta que consigas conectarla. 

Controls Download Instructions

1. Download the file called 'Rootrients'.

2. After downloading it, decompress the .zip file.

3. Lastly, open the game folder and run the .exe file.

We hope you enjoy it!
